summary: This is an email chain between attorneys discussing scheduling a meeting to propose a briefing schedule in a legal matter. It involves an Assistant United States Attorney and defense attorneys from the Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco law firm.

persons.name: Bruce Barket
persons.context: Attorney from Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP who sends an email proposing to schedule a meeting to discuss a briefing schedule.

persons.name: Tony Ricco
persons.context: Copied on the email from Bruce Barket regarding the proposed schedule.

persons.name: Michael Bachrach
persons.context: Copied on the email from Bruce Barket regarding the proposed schedule.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated September 20, 2019, regarding scheduling a meeting between legal parties.
Bruce Barket, an attorney from Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP, is coordinating with an Assistant United States Attorney and other attorneys.
The law firm's name includes 'Epstein', indicating a potential connection to the Epstein case legal proceedings.
The correspondence is marked as potentially confidential attorney-client communication.
The email discusses proposing a briefing schedule for an unspecified legal matter.
